meta.title: Catherine Petrenko — Project & Product Manager Portfolio
meta.description: Project & Product Manager with expertise in e-commerce, business automation, and digital transformation. I build systems that keep working even when people rest.

header.subtitle: Project & Product Manager. I build systems that keep working even when people rest.

about.title: About Me
paragraphs: I am a project and product manager combining business logic, engineering thinking, and legal precision. For over 10 years, I’ve led IT projects for large e-commerce companies, including international ones.

My specialization is systems management: I build processes that work even without manual oversight. I create infrastructure where the team is stable, communication transparent, and decisions data-driven.
I believe people are more important than processes — but infrastructure allows them to be effective without burning out. My focus is always on balancing order and creativity.
